HomePage.description: A community-driven effort to enhance earthquake resilience and structural integrity in Myanmar.
HomePage.who_we_are: We are a non-governmental organization of professionals dedicated to promoting earthquake-resistant construction in Myanmar.
HomePage.Community Centered description: MEEC helps communities learn from experts to build stronger, earthquake-resistant structures.
HomePage.Knowledge Sharing description: MEEC focuses on research, technical knowledge sharing, and public awareness related to seismic safety and engineering practices.
HomePage.Social Responsibility description: MEEC collaborates with academics, government bodies, and inter-national partners to strengthen earthquake resilience across the country.
HomePage.Read more news on our blog: Read more news on our blog
HomePage.Publications description: This core collection covers all technical areas of civil engineering. MEEC’s publications include books, peer-reviewed journals, conference proceedings, and magazines.
HomePage.Youtube description: Stay connected and get the latest news and insights from MEEC’s youtube channel
